A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie had all the elements for a great flick.  The tltle alone set it up for greatness.  It's Star Wars for goodness sake!  Good visuals\, great backstories\, decades of lore\, beloved old characters\, new vilians\, interesting younger mix of characters from TFA.  

Here's what we got instead -
Tacky jokes - check
Bad acting - check
Plot holes - check
Dumb death scenes - check
Character assassination of Luke - check
Barely any epic battle scenes - check
Annoying new characters (Rose) - check
Attempt to shove new toys at us (Porg) - check
In your face politics throughout - check

Way to ruin the most successful franchise in cinema history.  Only 2.5 hours and you flushed it down the commode.
